Title: The Sentimental Swordsman
Actors: Lung Ti, Li Ching, Tung-Shing Yee
Plot: The Sentimental Swordsman epitomizes the lone, virtuous, heroic swordsman with a twist. The Oedipus complexed swordsman played by the popular Ti Lung, is a hero with weaknesses; he drinks, thereby losing his girlfriend via tricked...
